createredirect-error:
Unused at this time.

Used as error message.
createredirect-instructions:
Used as instructions message.

This message is followed by the Redirect form.
createredirect-page-title:
Used as label for Original Title input box.
{{Identical|Page title}}
createredirect-redirect-done:
This message indicates the redirect $2 (from the page $1) has been created successfully.

Parameters:
* $1 - original title
* $2 - redirect title
createredirect-redirect-to: Used as label for Redirect Title input box.
createredirect-save:
Used as Submit button text.
{{Identical|Save page}}
